Insight.NAME: Insight
Insight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.
Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.

Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, draw 2 cards and Exhaust.

Evade.NAME: Evade
Evade.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E].

Daydream.NAME: Daydream
Daydream.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Inspiration into your draw pile.

Overpower.NAME: Overpower
Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus 1 for every !M! points of health you currently have.

DarkPact.NAME: Dark Pact
DarkPact.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Shuffle a Regret into your draw pile.

Roost.NAME: Roost
Roost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Increase this cards cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

HuntressEssence.NAME: Huntress Essence
HuntressEssence.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and draw !M! card for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust
HuntressEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and draw !M! cards for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust

MachineEssence.NAME: Machine Essence
MachineEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive healing, heal an additional !M! HP.

WarriorEssence.NAME: Warrior Essence
WarriorEssence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! X times. Heal equal to half the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

FakeOut.NAME: Fake Out
FakeOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Swap your draw pile and discard pile.

Hexing.NAME: Hexing
Hexing.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 2 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to all enemies that don't intend to attack.

Redirect.NAME: Redirect
Redirect.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times your Strength, then lose all Strength. NL Wither 1.

DesperateSwing.NAME: Desperate Swing
DesperateSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus 1 for every !M! points of HP missing.

Foresight.NAME: Foresight
Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E].
Foresight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E].

SowTheSeeds.NAME: Sow the Seeds
SowTheSeeds.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Respite into your draw pile.

Respite.NAME: Respite
Respite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, heal !M! HP.

TuckingFeathers.NAME: Tucking Feathers
TuckingFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Gain Block equal to their total cost.

Negation.NAME: Negation
Negation.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next Wither effect this combat. NL Exhaust.
Negation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next !M! Wither effects this combat. NL Exhaust.

Recite.NAME: Recite
Recite.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Psalm cards to your hand.

Psalm.NAME: Psalm
Psalm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Wither !M!.

Struggle.NAME: Struggle
Struggle.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if Struggle is the only playable card in hand. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Take 1 damage. NL Deals !M! more damage for each card in hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have playable cards in my hand!

Devastation.NAME: Devastation
Devastation.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Depleted card, draw !M! more card.
Devastation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Depleted card, draw !M! more cards.

Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then heal the enemy for !M! HP. Gain !I! Strength. When this kills an enemy, permanently increase the Strength by 1. Exhaust.

Brainwash.NAME: Brainwash
Brainwash.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Depleted cards in your hand. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.

DarkTribute.NAME: Dark Tribute
DarkTribute.DESCRIPTION: Heal ALL HP. NL Gain !I! Poison. NL Wither !M!.

LiftOff.NAME: Lift Off
LiftOff.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage from attacks. If you are attacked !M! times in one turn, lose this power and skip your next turn.

Caw.NAME: CAW!
Caw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Apply X Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Wither !M!.
Caw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X+1 times. Apply X+1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Wither !M!.

SacrificialScars.NAME: Sacrificial Scars
SacrificialScars.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL You cannot heal for 3 turns. NL Exhaust.
SacrificialScars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 7 HP. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL You cannot heal for 3 turns. Exhaust.

AwakenedForm.NAME: Awakened Form
AwakenedForm.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Boss killed. NL Your cards cost 1 less [E].

BounceBack.NAME: Bounce Back
BounceBack.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Exhaust.

StickSmack.NAME: Stick Smack
StickSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Stick into your draw pile.
StickSmack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an Upgraded Stick into your draw pile.

Stick.NAME: Stick
Stick.DESCRIPTION: ALL Stick-Smack cards deal !M! additional damage this combat. Return the last played Stick-Smack card to your hand.
